=== Praat - Fonetics with computer ===
<nowiki>[[http://www.praat.org|Praat]]</nowiki> is free software used to for speech synthesis and analysis.

=== Installation ===

<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/warning.png]]</nowiki> '''WARNING''': This Praat compilation will only run on processors newer than Pentium III and AMD K6-2 or equal.

Install the <nowiki>[[apt:praat|praat]]</nowiki> package from the Universe repository.
